meanings.definition: Of or relating to iodine with a valence of three.
meanings.sent1: The iodous solution turned the experiment purple.
meanings.sent2: Her iodous necklace shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The iodous cat costume made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: His iodous personality was as vibrant as a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The iodous smell of the ocean lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A compound containing iodine with a valence of three.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the iodous to understand its properties.
meanings.sent2: I spilled the iodous on my lab coat by accident.
meanings.sent3: The iodous spilled all over the floor, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The iodous in the bottle seemed to glow with mystery.
meanings.sent5: The iodous was carefully measured for the experiment.
